scripts.test: cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test tests/qetest/test-url-qe.spec.ts --project chromium
scripts.test:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/qetest/test-url-qe.spec.ts -g "Link Shop" --project chromium
scripts.test:stage: cross-env ENV=stage npx playwright test tests/qetest/test-url-qe.spec.ts -g "Link Shop" --project chromium
